Posts.Content: Apr 15, 2015 12:53AM Crossmom wrote: Hi All! Glad to be in touch with others in same situation. Diagnosed on 3/24/15 with stage 3 IDC. Had first treatment on April 8, 2015. TCH for treatments. I have had side effects. Lots of fatigue. Not a lot of nausea, but a dragon has taken up residence in my stomach! No real D but Big C. I have not been able to eat due to reflux. I'm still so weak I can hardly climb stairs in my house. This is upsetting. I have a huge support network and a wonderful hubby! (We think he is having "sympathetic chemo"!!) Just hoping that this fatigue lets up. I am an AWFUL sick person.
Posts.Title: April 2015 Chemo Crew... Starting in April? Please join us! KBeee KBeee
